description:
Older version of XenServer require us to keep the live copy of xenstore updated in sync with the copy of xenstore recorded in the xenapi metadata for that VM.

Code inspection has shown that we don't consistently keep those two copies up to date.

While its hard to reproduce this errors, (add_ip_address_to_vm seems particuarly likely to hit issues), it seems best to tidy up the xenstore writing code so we consistently add/remove keys from the live copy and the copy in xenapi.
title: xenapi: still get MAP_DUPLICATE_KEY in some edge cases

comments.content:
Older version of XenServer require us to keep the live copy of xenstore updated in sync with the copy of xenstore recorded in the xenapi metadata for that VM.

Code inspection has shown that we don't consistently keep those two copies up to date.

While its hard to reproduce this errors, (add_ip_address_to_vm seems particuarly likely to hit issues), it seems best to tidy up the xenstore writing code so we consistently add/remove keys from the live copy and the copy in xenapi.
